thread.title: Loretta C.

author: Loretta C.
title: Loretta C.
text: I've been shopping with Candy Warehouse for a few months now and love being able to find some of the specialty candy that you can't just go to the store and find. I will say that there are some items that are priced far higher than the stores so for those I just go to the store. But for the most part, being able to find everything I want all in one spot is awesome. Thank you Candy Warehouse
